lyrics.line: Today is Ronnie's birthday she is pretty smart and becoming a doctor,
She'll save lives and make a difference, that's what we expect her
She's got the brains and the heart, to make this world a better place,
And on her special day, we all come together to celebrate her grace
Ronnie may not be one for parties or fancy things,
But she sure does know how to make our hearts sing
With her smile as bright as the sun, and her laugh that fills the air,
We all feel lucky just to know her, let alone call her friend or family member
As Ronnie blows out the candles on her cake tonight,
We'll all raise a glass in honor of this beautiful sight
A woman who has worked so hard to achieve what she has today,
And still manages to stay humble and kind in every single way
So here's to you Ronnie, on your special day of birth,
May you continue to shine bright like diamonds on this earth
And may your journey ahead be filled with success and love galore,
Happy Birthday Ronnie! We couldn't ask for anything more
